verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

On the first day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H259><s%> <S%H2320><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shalt thou set up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And thou shalt put <S%H7760><s%> therein <S%H8033><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and cover <S%H5526><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

And thou shalt bring in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> and set in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H853><s%> the things that are to be set in order <S%H6187><s%> upon it; and thou shalt bring in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the candlestick, <S%H4501><s%> and light <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> thereof.

And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for the incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and shalt put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therein. <S%H8033><s%>

And thou shalt set up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and hang up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> at the court <S%H2691><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is therein, and shalt hallow <S%H6942><s%> it, and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof: and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H853><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%> and it shall be <S%H1961><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> most holy. <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%>
And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and his foot, <S%H3653><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it.

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

And thou shalt put upon <S%H3847><s%> <S%H853><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> the <S%H853><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> him, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him; that he may minister unto me in the priest's office. <S%H3547><s%>
And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and clothe <S%H3847><s%> them with coats: <S%H3801><s%>

And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> them, as <S%H834><s%> thou didst anoint <S%H4886><s%> <S%H853><s%> their father, <S%H1><s%> that they may minister unto me in the priest's office: <S%H3547><s%> for their anointing <S%H4886><s%> shall surely be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1961><s%> an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> priesthood <S%H3550><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Moses: <S%H4872><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> he.

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared up. <S%H6965><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> reared up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and fastened <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sockets, <S%H134><s%> and set up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> thereof, and put in <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof, and reared up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> his pillars. <S%H5982><s%>

And he spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it; as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the ark: <S%H727><s%>

And he brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and set up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the covering, <S%H4539><s%> and covered <S%H5526><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony; <S%H5715><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

And he set <S%H6186><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> in order <S%H6187><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> over against <S%H5227><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> southward. <S%H5045><s%>
And he lighted <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And he put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil: <S%H6532><s%>
And he burnt <S%H6999><s%> sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon; <S%H5921><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And he set up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meat offering; <S%H4503><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> withal.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%> thereat: <S%H4480><s%>

When they went <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and when they came near <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> they washed; <S%H7364><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he reared up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and set up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the hanging <S%H4539><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%> So Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> <S%H853><s%> the work. <S%H4399><s%>

Then a cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> able <S%H3201><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from over <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went onward <S%H5265><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their journeys: <S%H4550><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> were not <S%H3808><s%> taken up, <S%H5927><s%> then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was taken up. <S%H5927><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> on it by night, <S%H3915><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> their journeys. <S%H4550><s%>
